instructions: Walk to the left of the railing down the hall. Continue down the hall and stop next to the room with the workout equipment.
Walk down the hallway with the black railing. Walk past the painting and brown door. Stop in front of the two framed pictures.
Walk all the way down the hallway keeping the wall on your left and stop in front of the door on your right side that has the treadmill inside.
instructions_minimal: Go left down the hall. Continue until you reach the room with workout equipment.
Walk down the hallway. Walk past the painting and door. Stop in front of the two framed pictures.
Walk down the hallway and stop at the door on your right.
instructions_goal_only: Stop next to the room with the workout equipment.
Stop in front of the two framed pictures.
Stop in front of the door with the treadmill.

instructions: Enter the kitchen, take the exit past the refrigerator, then turn right down the hallway until you reach the stairs, then take another right and wait at the base of the stairs.

When you leave the sitting area and are facing the kitchen take a left and go through the entryway. Once you are in the hall take a right and walk straight down the hall until you get to the stairs. Next, you need to take a right so you are in front of the stairs. Wait in front of the stairs.
Go out the kitchen using the opening on the left then turn right and head toward the stairs and wait there.
instructions_minimal: Enter the kitchen, exit, turn right down the hallway, reach the stairs, turn right, and wait at the base of the stairs.
Exit the sitting area, turn left, and go through the entryway. In the hall, turn right and walk straight to the stairs. Turn right to face the stairs and wait there.
Exit the kitchen to the left, turn right, and go to the stairs. Wait there.
instructions_goal_only: Wait at the base of the stairs.
Wait in front of the stairs.
Wait at the stairs.

instructions: Exit through door on right, go down the hall, towards stairs on left side, stop at the top of the stairs.

Go towards the black and white abstract painting directly ahead of you.Make an immediate right at the lime green colored doors. Go down the hallway until you see another abstract painting on your left and then wait at the top of the stairs.
Walk forward and take the first right to leave the room. In the hall stay left and go down the first two stairs. Stop on the second from the top stair.
instructions_minimal: Exit through the door on the right, go down the hall, and stop at the top of the stairs on the left.
Go straight and make an immediate right at the doors. Continue down the hallway and wait at the top of the stairs.
Walk forward and take the first right to leave the room. In the hall, stay left and go down the first two stairs. Stop on the second stair.
instructions_goal_only: Go to the top of the stairs.
Wait at the top of the stairs.
Stop on the second from the top stair.

instructions: Walk through the bedroom into the hallway. Turn right and wait in the kitchen doorway.
Enter the bedroom then exit from the door on the left, through the double doors and through the opening on the immediate right. Enter the kitchen from there.
Walk to the left of the bed and through the doorway. Turn right and walk into the hallway. Stop in the entryway across from the double doors.
instructions_minimal: Walk through the bedroom into the hallway. Turn right and wait in the kitchen doorway.
Enter the bedroom, exit through the door on the left, go through the double doors, then through the opening on the right. Enter the kitchen.
Go through the doorway by the bed. Turn right and enter the hallway. Stop in the entryway across from the double doors.
instructions_goal_only: Wait in the kitchen doorway.
Enter the kitchen.
Stop in the entryway across from the double doors.

instructions: Go forward past the sitting area and walk onto the patio. On the patio take a right, and stop in front of the two iron chairs.
Walk down the hallway past the sofa and out the front door.  Turn right and stand on the deck.

Walk down the hall past the painting. Continue past the bedroom. Walk towards the small gnome statue on the left. Walk out the door to the outside. Turn right. Stop on the deck next to the sansevieria plants.
instructions_minimal: Go forward to the patio, then take a right and stop.
Walk down the hallway and out the front door. Turn right and stand on the deck.
Walk down the hall. Continue past the bedroom. Walk out the door to the outside. Turn right. Stop on the deck.
instructions_goal_only: Stop in front of the two iron chairs.
Stand on the deck.
Stop on the deck next to the sansevieria plants.

instructions: Go all the way down the stairs. At the bottom of the stairs, turn left. Go past the couch and take another left. Stop there.
Go down the stairs and take a left. Take the left at the bottom of the stairs. Stop next to the closet door on the left.
Go down the cheetah stairs then turn left and pass the couch then turn left and wait there by the small door on your left.
instructions_minimal: Go down the stairs. Turn left. Go past the couch and turn left again. Stop.
Go down the stairs and turn left. Stop next to the closet door on the left.
Go down the stairs, turn left, continue, then turn left and wait by the door on your left.
instructions_goal_only: Stop at the second left after the couch.
Stand next to the closet door.
Wait by the small door.

instructions: Exit the bedroom, go passed the table with china on it, turn left into the doorway, and then turn right, go straight passed the china case and then turn left into the doorway. Step between the bed and the window on the right and stop.
Leave the room and go straight. take the last left into the hall. In the hall take the last left into the bedroom. Stop in front of the right side of the foot board.
Turn around and exit the bedroom and enter the dining room. Exit the dining room and turn left to enter another bedroom. Wait at the foot of the bed.
instructions_minimal: Exit the bedroom, turn left into the doorway, then turn right. Go straight and turn left into the doorway. Stop between the bed and the window on the right.
Exit the room and go straight. Take the last left into the hall. In the hall, take the last left into the bedroom. Stop at the right side of the footboard.
Exit the bedroom, enter the dining room. Exit the dining room, turn left, and enter the next bedroom. Wait by the bed.
instructions_goal_only: Stop between the bed and the window.
Stop in front of the right side of the foot board in the bedroom.
Wait at the foot of the bed.

instructions: Go towards the stairs and walk all the way up, and enter a room straight ahead, and stop there.

walk away from the bathroom towards the stairs, turn left and walk up the stairs turn right and walk up the next flights of stairs, turn right and walk up the rest of the stairs and stop  in the doorway.

From the bathroom doorway, walk towards the staircase. Go up the stairs. Whey you reach the landing, turn right and continue to go up the stairs. When you reach the next landing turn right and walk to the top of the stairs and into the kitchen.
instructions_minimal: Go up the stairs. Enter the room straight ahead. Stop.
Walk to the stairs, turn left, and go up. Turn right and continue up the stairs. Turn right again and go up the rest of the stairs. Stop at the doorway.
Exit the bathroom and go to the staircase. Go up the stairs, turn right at the landing, and continue up. Turn right again at the next landing, go to the top of the stairs, and enter the kitchen.
instructions_goal_only: Enter the room ahead.
Stop in the doorway.
Enter the kitchen.

instructions: Walk down the hall and turn right, walk a step or two and turn left out of the double doors.  Then walk towards the staircase but turn at the first door on the left.  This is a bedroom.  Wait just inside the doorway.
Walk down the hall and take your first right. Then turn left and walk down the hall. Take the first left before the stairs and enter the bedroom. Stop inside the doorway to the bedroom.
Walk down the hall, take the first right, then a left through the doors, walk to the end of the hallway and turn left, wait in the doorway to the child's bedroom.
instructions_minimal: Go down the hall and turn right. Take a few steps and turn left through the doors. Walk towards the staircase and turn at the first door on the left. Wait inside the doorway.
Walk down the hall and take your first right. Turn left and walk down the hall. Take the first left before the stairs and enter the bedroom. Stop inside the doorway.
Walk down the hall, take the first right, then a left through the doors. Walk to the end of the hallway and turn left. Wait in the doorway to the bedroom.
instructions_goal_only: Enter the bedroom and wait just inside the doorway.
Enter the bedroom.
Wait in the doorway to the child's bedroom.

instructions: Walk up the flight of stairs to the top. Turn and walk through the open door to the bathroom with the painting of a tree.
Walk up the stairs.  At the top of the stairs, make a left and walk to the first doorway on your right.  Go through this doorway, and you will be in a bathroom.  Stop in front of the bathroom mirror.
Walk up the stairs and take a left. Enter the bathroom through the first door on your right. Stop in front of the sink on your left.
instructions_minimal: Walk up the stairs. Turn and go through the door to the bathroom.
Go up the stairs. At the top, turn left. Walk to the first doorway on your right and go through it. Stop in front of the mirror.
Go up the stairs and turn left. Enter the first door on your right. Stop by the sink on your left.
instructions_goal_only: Enter the bathroom with the painting of a tree.
Go to the bathroom mirror.
Go to the sink in the bathroom.

instructions: Go up the stairs and take a right. Stop outside the bathroom door.
Turn and walk up the staircase to the top. Walk towards the pink open door at the top of the stairs.
Walk up stairs. Wait at top of stair landing.
instructions_minimal: Go up the stairs and turn right. Stop at the door.
Go up the staircase to the top. Walk towards the open door.
Walk up stairs. Wait at the top.

Go to the pink open door.
Wait at the top of the stairs.

instructions: Walk straight down hallway until you reach hallway with lights on the walls. Stop at first light on wall.
walk down the hallway directly across from the bathroom sink, continue straight through the large foyer and through the archway, stop in between the first two stripes of black tile.
Turn around and walk straight down the hall. Continue to walk straight past the front doors and the dresser. Walk through the doorway and wait by the light.
instructions_minimal: Walk straight down the hallway. Stop at the first light on the wall.
Walk down the hallway across from the bathroom sink, continue straight through the foyer and through the archway, and stop between the first two stripes of tile.
Turn around and walk straight down the hall. Continue straight past the doors. Walk through the doorway and wait.
instructions_goal_only: Stop at the first light on the wall.
Stop in between the first two stripes of black tile.
Wait by the light.

instructions: Enter the walkway area and walk towards the hallway with the stairs. Turn right and walk past the stairs. Stop into the doorway to the bedroom on the right.
Go straight down the hallway and take a right into the bedroom passed the stairs.
Walk past the dresser and exit the room. Continue down the hall and turn hard right. Go past the stairs and stop in the doorway of the bedroom.
instructions_minimal: Walk to the hallway with the stairs. Turn right and walk past the stairs. Enter the doorway to the bedroom on the right.
Go straight down the hallway and take a right into the bedroom.
Exit the room, go down the hall, and turn right. Pass the stairs and stop at the bedroom doorway.

Enter the bedroom.

instructions: Walk through the dining room. Walk past the bathroom, on the right. Walk past the dining room on the left, and the wine storage on the right. Wait at the back of the white loveseat.

Head straight toward the large table and chairs. Pass the table and chairs and continue down the hallway. When you get to another large table with chairs (this table has glass on the top) turn right and go straight into the room with the pool table by going through large arch. Then wait by the white couches.
Move around the right side of the dining table to exit the room. Turn right at the table. Stop behind the left side of the love seat.
instructions_minimal: Walk through the dining room. Continue past the bathroom on the right. Continue past the dining room on the left and the wine storage on the right. Wait at the back of the loveseat.
Go straight down the hallway. When you reach the second table, turn right and go through the arch into the room with the pool table. Wait by the couches.
Exit the room by moving around the right side of the table. Turn right. Stop behind the left side of the seat.

Wait by the white couches.
Stop behind the left side of the love seat.

instructions: Walk up the stairs and stop on the third step from the top.

Turn around where you are and walk up the first flight of stairs.  Turn left at the landing and walk up the second flight of stairs.  Stop just before you get to the top of the second flight of stairs.
Go up the stairs towards a glass block window, go up and wait to stairs from the top of the rest of the stairs.
instructions_minimal: Walk up the stairs and stop on the third step from the top.
Turn around and go up the first flight of stairs. Turn left at the landing and go up the second flight. Stop before the top.
Go up the stairs and wait at the top.

Stop before the top of the second flight of stairs.
Wait at the top of the stairs.

instructions: Walk down the stairs and turn left, turn right at the first door and walk through kitchen through second door, stop after the door that leads into the garage.

Walk down the stairs and keep walking to enter the corner that is slightly left. Walk passing the sink and the washing machines and stop right outside the door with a round doormat placed in front of the door.
Go down the stairs, take a left, then take a right through the laundry room, stopping in the doorway to the garage.

Exit the building and turn right. Walk to the steps and wait at the top.
Exit the building. Turn right and stop at the top of the stairs.

instructions: Exiting the viewing room, go to the top of the stairs on the right, go down the stairs, at the level make a left and down the rest of the stairs, at the bottom level stop.

instructions: Walk through the room with green and blue chairs. Walk passed the bookshelf and turn the corner to the left. Walk down the hall and turn into the first open doors to the right into the room with a conference table.

Walk straight and turn left at the hallway then wait in the doorway of the first room on the left side of the hall.

instructions: Continue down the hallway and stop once you're near the stairs.
Follow the narrow hallway straight, until you reach the staircase.  Wait here.
Walk all the way forward passing the mirror on your left. Walk toward the staircase, and stop in front of the staircase.

Proceed straight down the hallway to the staircase and wait.
Walk forward and stop in front of the staircase.

instructions: Go straight and pass the table and chairs. Go through he door. Turn right. Pass the kitchen and stop near the glass table with chairs.
Go left passed the table and through the door to the kitchen. Turn right and stop once you reach the kitchen counter with white chairs.
Walk into the kitchen from the dining room. Take a right and exit in the dining area. Stop next to the bar stool on the left.

Turn towards the right and walk down the hallway towards the kitchen table. Pass the table and go through the crooked rectangular door way and then stop.

Go past the chair and table. Head up the stairs and go left. Go right and stop between the two doors.

instructions: Walk through the open door beside the stairs. Before you reach the black table, turn right.  Walk towards the wall, then turn left, and wait by the bedroom door.
Go straight through the door, pass to the right of the table, turn left and go halfway down the hallway to stop by the painting.

Walk straight ahead and into the door. Once inside, walk towards the table and then turn right. Walk to the wall with several paintings and then turn left. Enter the hallway and stop in front of the doorway on the left.

instructions: Walk past the metal bench. Walk through the glass doors and turn right. Stop just past the corner.

Walk towards the white stand holding the plant, and then take a left at the doors leading to outside. Walk towards the red man statue on the ground, and stop once you reached it.

instructions: Go up the stairs. Turn right towards the table and go up the other set of stairs. Stop at the top of the stairs.
Go up the steps and turn right. Go up three steps on the stairs on your right and stop.

Stop on the staircase.

instructions: Go into the hall to the right of the TV. Then turn through the left doorway. Go and stop in the doorway leading outside.

instructions: exit bathroom to hallway. turn right and walk down hallway till it ends, turn right, and walk into hall, turn left at door and walk into office. Walk straight through office into bedroom. stop in doorway.

Stop in the bedroom doorway.

instructions: Exit the conference room, and make a left. Make a right just before the white bookcase. Wait at the green glass bowl on the bottom shelf of the bookcase.
Turn around and exit the room. Once you enter the large room turn left. Walk past the Think pods and turn right. Stop when you are at the door for the first think pod.
Face the exit. Walk straight out the door. Turn left in front of the white desk. Walk past the white desk and turn right. Turn right, walk to where the two white desks meet and stop.

Exit the room and turn left. Walk forward, then turn right. Stop at the first door.

instructions: Turn around.  Walk down the hall and turn left continue walking down the hall until you get to the reception area's desk. Stop and wait right next to it.
Walk past ceiling vent. Walk past lockers. Wait at metal desk.

Walk past the columns and turn right. Enter the dinning room and walk past the table . Turn left and enter the hallway.

enter house off porch, turn slight left to avoid furniture and walk across living room to hall. turn right in hall and enter bathroom. stop at sink.
Go Indoors, turn left, walk around the furniture, exit the room through the double doors, take the first right and go straight in to the bathroom, stop beside the counter.

instructions: With the abstract paint smears to your right and the striped wallpaper to your left, go forward down the narrow hallway. At the end take a hard left, then another hard left into the bathroom.
Walk down the hall with the abstract artwork on your right.  Keep going until you see a bathroom and wait at the bathroom doorway.
Walk down the hallway and turn left. Turn left and walk into the bathroom and stop.

instructions: Leave the bedroom and walk through the office and into the hallway.  Turn right and walk towards the frosted windows and then turn left.  Keep walking down the hallway until you see the stairs and then turn right.  Walk past the stairs and go towards the room with the big grey ball in it.  Stop in the doorway without going in this room.
Exit the room. Go past the desk with the chair on the right and exit the room. Turn right and then turn left. Wait near the stairs.

Exit the bedroom and walk straight across the adjacent room.  You will pass a computer on your right.  Exit that room and turn right.  Walk down the hall toward the wall with the glass cubes embedded in it, and then make a left.  Make a right at the first doorway you come to.  You will pass a staircase on your left.  Stop when you get past the staircase.

Exit the bedroom and walk straight across the adjacent room. Exit that room and turn right. Walk down the hall and then make a left. Make a right at the first doorway. Pass the staircase on your left and stop.
